Hi,

I just installed Heritrix and when I tried to start or run the
selftest  get this error.

20:56:08.825 EVENT  Started WebApplicationContext[/,Selftest]
20:56:08.976 WARN!! Failed to start: SocketListener@0.0.0.0:8080
Exception in thread "main"
org.mortbay.util.MultiException[java.net.BindException: Address
already in use]
        at org.mortbay.http.HttpServer.start(HttpServer.java:640)
        at
org.archive.crawler.SimpleHttpServer.startServer(SimpleHttpServer.java:217)
        at org.archive.crawler.Heritrix.selftest(Heritrix.java:694)
        at org.archive.crawler.Heritrix.doStart(Heritrix.java:483)
        at org.archive.crawler.Heritrix.main(Heritrix.java:260)


Tomcat5
Java Sun 1.5
Fedora Core 3

Thanks in advance.

Ken
